actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the derro can choose to deal no damage, and instead the target has the prone condition.
actions.name: Hooked Spear

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Throwing Hammer

specialTraits.description: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls.
specialTraits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
